name: PlatziCollab
description:
This platform aims to connect talented people through projects with a lot of potential that need that talent.

On this platform, the users will be the same Platzi students and they will be able to publish their own ideas or projects so that in this way new talents can join together to work as a team.

Users will also be able to give and receive feedback on projects, show their professional profile and connect with new people to expand their network of contacts.
